channel.title: Ranging Glitch on DreamScape PI
channel.description:
When people range npc's or players on DreamScape PI source, it doesnt give hits or show any hit markers and i get this error on my server cmd prompt:
[1/13/12 11:59 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [1/13/12 11:59 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.delayedHit(Comba tAssistant.java:477) [1/13/12 11:59 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1406) [1/13/12 11:59 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:161) [1/13/12 11:59 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:161)
